JobFullDesc:
Our Infrastructure Engineers are big-picture thinkers who can accelerate the adoption of the latest cloud technologies so that we can deliver new features that bring delight to our customers. Our Senior Infrastructure Engineers, guide and mentor Tech Leads for individual projects and lead 3-4 other engineers to execute on a given project. The Chainalysis engineering team is building a suite of compliance and investigation products for cryptocurrency businesses, traditional financial institutions, and governments. Our Infrastructure engineers are really good at scaling out our services using infrastructure as code practices. They help build infrastructure for data ingestion pipelines and compute clusters. We measure success by how well we enable engineers to safely operate with little to no intervention.  In one year you’ll know you were successful if…

You’ve reduced the friction in an engineer’s day-to-day workflow by doing things like improving existing CI processes, implementing continuous delivery, and helping us transition to infrastructure as code model. 
Improve the monitoring and observability of our infrastructure, services, and applications. 
Configure and deploy highly available and secure infrastructure with tools like Ansible and Terraform. 
Worked closely with InfoSec to introduce security guardrails to continuously prevent vulnerabilities and threat vectors
You have participated in a cross-functional project where your influence and contribution accelerated engineering velocity

A background like this helps: 

Progressive and extensive experience in a development operations role or similar function, with a track record of building, maintaining, and launching new offerings on AWS
Experience running Java in a production environment 
Hands-on experience with core AWS offerings: EC2, EKS, ECS, MSK, Postgres RDS/Aurora,  Lambda, DynamoDB, API Gateway, Athena, Prior success implementing and scaling infrastructure as code with Terraform and Ansible
Experience constructing and maintaining GitOps deployment pipelines
Experience operating cloud-native software with Kubernetes and working collaboratively with developers on-site reliability

 
#LI-DM1At Chainalysis, we help government agencies, cryptocurrency businesses, and financial institutions track and investigate illicit activity on the blockchain, allowing them to engage confidently with cryptocurrency. We take care of our people with great benefits, professional development opportunities, and fun.
You belong here. 
At Chainalysis, we believe that diversity of experience and thought makes us stronger. With both customers and employees around the world, we are committed to ensuring our team reflects the unique communities around us. Some of the ways we’re ensuring we keep learning are an internal Diversity Committee, Days of Reflection throughout the year including International Women’s Day, Juneteenth, Harvey Milk Day, and International Migrant’s Day, and a commitment to continue revisiting and reevaluating our diversity culture. 
We encourage applicants across any race, ethnicity, gender/gender expression, age, religion, ability, experience and more. Additionally, if you need any accommodations to make our interview process more accessible to you due to a disability, don't hesitate to let us know. You can learn more here. We can’t wait to meet you.  
Applying from the EU? Please review our Candidate GDPR Notice.
         
 
By submitting this application, I consent to and authorize Chainalysis to contact my former employers, and any and all other persons and organizations for information bearing upon my qualifications for employment.  I further authorize the listed employers, schools and personal references to give Chainalysis (without further notice to me) any and all information about my previous employment and education, along with other pertinent information they may have, and hereby waive any actions which I may have against either party(ies) for providing a reference.  I understand any future employment will be contingent on the Company receiving satisfactory employment references.
